# delegate

**Instance Property**

The synthesizer’s delegate.

## Declaration

```swift
weak var delegate: (any NSSpeechSynthesizerDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Customizing the Speech Synthesizer Behavior

- **NSSpeechSynthesizerDelegate**: A set of optional methods implemented by delegates of [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpeechSynthesizer] objects.
